name: Station 21 - Space Station Simulator
description: Build, Earn and Survive that's the aim of Station 21. Start from nothing and work your way to building a massive scale space station with crew to run it. Manage your station by keeping your crew fit and healthy, adding new modules and managing your incoming and outgoings. The possibilities are endless.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
